title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush on Thursday. Mitch McConnell’s middle finger at us. It takes one senator to have a debate about this election. Silence on four states changing election laws. Circular, self-defeating excuses. Maybe we should say China stole election for Biden. Democrats’ silence is just as telling as Republicans’. Texas election whistleblowers being prosecuted.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Jennifer Rubin’s Limbaugh Derangement Syndrome predates her Trump Derangement Syndrome. 74 million-plus wanted an outsider. John Kerry will advise Biden on the climate. The story of the year is the Deep State. Are you brave enough to do the work? Ideological equity in Utah. What you can do to change things within the system. Let’s fight for what’s right. Don’t light the fuse, the left is begging for war. Mitch McConnell, it’s not time to play the game. Woke masks and technocrats. Seattle councilwoman wants to decriminalize crime.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

38 State AGs file monopoly charges against Google. Do you want any level of violence to break out? Media lies about Rush and secession when West Coast has already seceded. Don’t lose your soul and don’t lose your country. This is a test of the journalistic ethics system. Election Deflategate. Young people’s path for freedom. Power of prayer and power of action. Not one Senate Republican will stand up to election fraud. Make a list of three things to take action.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
